Simmered Pork with Bamboo Shoots
li.Desc: Put sliced pork belly and fresh bamboo shoots into the pot and simmer them with Shaoxing wine. When it is done, open the lid and smell the mouth-watering fragrance.

li.Name: Bamboo Jade
li.Desc: Use the freshest bamboo shoots in spring, cut into thin slices and then carved into the shape of an immortal tree. Tasty and aesthetically pleasing.

li.Name: Emperor's Soup Bun
li.Desc: Mix fresh crab roe with meat and wrap them in thin, leavened dough. The whole inside will be filled with golden crab oil after steamed. It is said that there used to be an emperor who would give up his royal robe to eat this bun.

li.Name: Crab Steamed with Shaoxing Wine
li.Desc: Use the finest Shaoxing wine to steam crabs of late autumn. The wine can expel the coldness in crabs. The smooth taste of Shaoxing wine mixes perfectly with the sweetness of crab meat.

li.Name: Emperor's Soup Bun

li.Name: Stir-fried Shredded Fish
li.Desc: Cut fresh swamp eels into shreds and stir fry them with seasoning ingredients. Requires meticulous cutting skills and speed.

li.Name: Stir-fried Fish with Onions
li.Desc: Boil fresh swamp eels till they are cooked, and then stir-fry with onions to remove the fishy smell. Gourmet food that is both healthy and tasty.

li.Name: Dragon Soup
li.Desc: Taking the imagery of carp leaping over the dragon's gate, this soup is mostly depended on the intricate order of cooking and use of spice, making it taste far better than normal fish dishes.

li.Name: Fish Hidden in Lamb
li.Desc: Stuff fish inside a large, sliced-open lamb, and cook it with condiments, creating a delicate taste. The flavor of fish combined with that of lamb makes it even more delicious. The lamb is soft and juicy, with tender and delicate fish stuffed inside.

li.Name: Liquor shrimp
li.Desc: Use liquor to soak shrimps, which makes them taste soft and sweet.

li.Name: Phoenix Tail shrimp
li.Desc: Wrap the shrimp tail with flour and fry it until it is soft and crisp, burnt outside and tender inside.
